cli_availability.version:
AMALGKIT version: 0.12.19
AMALGKIT command: /Users/4d/miniforge3/bin/amalgkit -h
AMALGKIT bug report: https://github.com/kfuku52/amalgkit/issues
usage: amalgkit [-h] [--version]
                {metadata,select,getfastq,quant,merge,cstmm,csca,curate,sanity,integrate,config,help}
                ...

A toolkit for cross-species transcriptome amalgamation

positional arguments:
  {metadata,select,getfastq,quant,merge,cstmm,csca,curate,sanity,integrate,config,help}
    metadata            NCBI SRA metadata retrieval and curation. See
                        `amalgkit metadata -h`
    select              Selecting SRA entries for analysis. See `amalgkit
                        select -h`
    getfastq            Retrieving fastq files. See `amalgkit getfastq -h`
    quant               Estimating transcript abundance with kallisto. See
                        `amalgkit quant -h`
    merge               Generating transcript abundance tables. See `amalgkit
                        merge -h`
    cstmm               Applying cross-species TMM normalization using single-
                        copy genes. See `amalgkit cstmm -h`
    csca                Generating plots with cross-species correlation
                        analysis. See `amalgkit csca -h`
    curate              Automatic removal of outlier samples and SVA-based
                        unwanted biases. See `amalgkit curate -h`
    sanity              Checking the integrity of AMALGKIT input and output
                        files. See `amalgkit sanity -h`
    integrate           Appending local fastq info to a metadata table. See
                        `amalgkit integrate -h`
    config              Creating a series of config files for the metadata
                        search. See `amalgkit config -h`
    help                Printing help messages

options:
  -h, --help            show this help message and exit
  --version             show program's version number and exit

amalgkit_integration.supported_species: All species with reference genomes in NCBI

integration_notes: Amalgkit must be installed and available in PATH
Requires internet connection for data downloads
Large datasets may require significant disk space
Multi-threading improves performance on large datasets

pipeline_steps.note: Each step can be run individually or as part of complete pipeline

step_descriptions.getfastq: Download FASTQ files from selected samples
step_descriptions.metadata: Download and process sample metadata from SRA
step_descriptions.quant: Quantify gene expression from RNA-seq reads
step_descriptions.select: Select appropriate samples based on criteria
